body:
Hi Mohammad,

There is no reason not to be able to do that in Honeybee. Honeybee accepts EnergyPlus materials and constructions as string (text) so as far as you have the right definition it should work. Also read my reply here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/pcm-materia...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/pcm-materials?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1566363&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
